text: Hello?
hi
How are you today?
good how about you?
I am well, thank you! Glad you are doing well also. Have you heard of the charity called Save the Children?
i have not, can you tell me more?
It is an international charity that helps children in need all around the world. These children have been victims of war, famine, and poverty. Does this sound like a good charity?
definitely, have you donated to them?
I have. 86% of the donations go directly to the programs that help the children. Do you believe that children in need deserve help from others?
yes i do

Great! Donations made from people like you can directly improve the lives of thousands of children all over the world. Even a small donation makes a big difference. Have you ever donated money to a charity before?
yes i have. a few times

That's great! Donating your payment from this task to Save the Children would make a big difference in a child's life today. You said earlier you believe children in need deserve help from others. Would you be willing to donate your payment from this task to the charity to help a child?
sure would love to

Awesome! The research team collects all donations from this task and send them to Save the Children.How much of your payment would you be willing to donate? You can choose any amount from $0 to the entire payment.
let's do 1
Great, thank you! Save the Children is a worldwide charity that give children access to healthcare, safety, and advocacy thanks to donations like yours. Do you have any other questions?
i do not
Ok, thank you for your time and donation, have a great day!
great you too
